  ### <a name="extensioninstallsources"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2978">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2978">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-and-user-script-install-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2979">Configurar fontes de instalação de extensão e script de usuário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2979">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2980">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2980">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2981">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2981">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2982">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2982">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2983">Defina URLs que possam instalar extensões e temas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2983">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-2984">Defina URLs que podem instalar extensões e temas diretamente sem ter que arrastar e soltar os pacotes para a página edge://extensions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2984">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-2985">Cada item nesta lista é um padrão de correspondência de estilo de extensão (consulte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2985">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2986">Os usuários podem instalar facilmente os itens de qualquer URL que corresponda a um item nesta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2986">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2987">O local do arquivo \*.crx e a página onde o download é iniciado (em outras palavras, a referencial) devem ser permitidos por esses padrões.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2987">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2988">Não hospede os arquivos em um local que exija autenticação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2988">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-2989">A política [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) tem precedência sobre esta política.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2989">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2990">As extensões que estiverem na lista de bloqueios não serão instaladas, mesmo se vierem de um site nesta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2990">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2991">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2991">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2992">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2992">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2993">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2993">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2994">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2994">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2995">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2995">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2996">Lista de cadeias de caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2996">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2997">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2997">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-2998">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2998">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-2999">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-2999">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3000">Nome da Política de Grupo: Configurar fontes de instalação de extensão e script de usuário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3000">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3001">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3001">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3002">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3002">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3003">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3003">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3004">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3004">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3005">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3005">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3006">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3006">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3007">Nome do valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3007">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3008">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3008">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3009">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3009">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3010">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3010">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3011">Nome da chave de preferência: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3011">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3012">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3012">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensionsettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3014">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3014">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-management-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3015">Definir configurações de gerenciamento de extensão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3015">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3016">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3016">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3017">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3017">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3018">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3018">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3019">A definição desta política controla as configurações de gerenciamento de extensão do Microsoft Edge, incluindo qualquer uma controlada por políticas relacionadas à extensão existentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3019">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3020">Essa política substitui qualquer política herdada que possa ser definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3020">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3021">Essa política mapeia um ID de extensão ou uma URL de atualização apenas para sua configuração específica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3021">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3022">Uma configuração padrão pode ser definida para a ID especial "\*", que se aplica a todas as extensões sem uma configuração personalizada nesta política.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3022">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3023">Com uma URL de atualização, a configuração se aplica a extensões com a URL de atualização exata, conforme indicado no manifesto da extensão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3023">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3024">Para obter mais detalhes, confira o guia detalhado da política ExtensionSettings disponível em [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3024">For more details, check out the detailed guide to ExtensionSettings policy available at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3025">Para bloquear extensões de um determinado armazenamento de terceiros, você só precisa bloquear o update_url para esse armazenamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3025">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3026">Por exemplo, se quiser bloquear extensões da Chrome Web Store, você pode usar o seguinte JSON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3026">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3027">{"update_url: https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx ":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3027">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3028">Observe que você ainda pode usar [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) e [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) para permitir/forçar a instalação de extensões específicas, mesmo se o armazenamento estiver bloqueado usando o JSON no exemplo anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3028">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3029">Observação: para caso de instâncias do Windows que não fazem parte de um domínio do Microsoft Active Directory, a instalação forçada fica limitada a aplicativos e extensões listados no site Complementos do Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3029">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3030">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3030">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3031">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3031">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3032">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3032">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3033">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3035">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3035">Dictionary</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3038">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3038">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3039">Nome da Política de Grupo: Configurar definições de gerenciamento de extensão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3039">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3040">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3041">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3041">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3043">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3044">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3045">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3045">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3046">Nome do Valor: ExtensionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3046">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3047">Tipo do valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3047">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3048">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3048">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ],
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads",
      "bookmarks"
    ],
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "blocked",
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ],
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  },
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "allowed",
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  },
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "force_installed",
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ],
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ],
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  },
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  },
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  },
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.",
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  },
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ],
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```

  ### <a name="allowcrossoriginauthprompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3056">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3056">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cross-origin-http-authentication-prompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3057">Permitir solicitações de autenticação HTTP Cross-Origin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3057">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3058">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3058">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3059">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3059">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3060">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3060">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3061">Controla se imagens de terceiros em uma página podem mostrar um aviso de autenticação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3061">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3062">Geralmente, isso é desabilitado como uma defesa contra phishing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3062">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3063">Se você não configurar essa política, ela será desabilitada e imagens de terceiros não poderão exibir um aviso de autenticação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3063">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3066">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3066">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3067">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3067">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ### <a name="authnegotiatedelegateallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3087">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3087">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-a-list-of-servers-that-microsoft-edge-can-delegate-user-credentials-to"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3088">Especifica uma lista de servidores para os quais o Microsoft Edge pode delegar credenciais de usuário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3088">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3089">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3089">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3090">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3090">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3091">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3091">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3092">Configure a lista de servidores que o Microsoft Edge pode delegar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3092">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3093">Separe vários nomes de servidor com vírgulas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3093">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3094">Caracteres curinga (\*) são permitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3094">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3095">Se você não configurar essa política, o Microsoft Edge não delegará credenciais de usuário, mesmo que um servidor seja detectado como intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3095">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3096">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3096">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3097">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3097">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3098">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3098">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3099">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3099">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3100">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3100">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3101">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3101">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3102">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3102">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3103">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3103">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3104">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3104">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3105">Nome da Política de Grupo: Especifica uma lista de servidores para os quais o Microsoft Edge pode delegar credenciais de usuário</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3105">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3106">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3106">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3107">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3107">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3108">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3108">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3109">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3109">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3110">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3110">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3111">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3111">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3112">Nome do Valor: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3112">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3113">Tipo do valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3113">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3114">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3114">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3117">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3117">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="authschemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3119">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3119">AuthSchemes</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-authentication-schemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3120">Esquemas de autenticação com suporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3120">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3121">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3121">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3122">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3122">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3123">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3123">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3124">Especifica quais esquemas de autenticação HTTP são compatíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3124">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3125">Você pode configurar a política usando estes valores: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3125">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3126">Separe vários valores com vírgulas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3126">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3127">Se você não configurar essa política, todos os quatro esquemas serão usados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3127">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3128">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3128">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3129">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3129">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3130">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3130">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3131">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3131">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3132">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3132">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3133">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3133">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3134">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3134">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3135">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3135">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3136">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3136">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3137">Nome da Política de Grupo: Esquemas de autenticação com suporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3137">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3138">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3138">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3139">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3139">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3140">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3140">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3141">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3141">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3142">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3142">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3143">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3143">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3144">Nome do valor: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3144">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3145">Tipo do valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3145">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3146">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3146">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3147">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3147">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3148">Nome da chave de preferência: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3148">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>

  ### <a name="authserverallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3151">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3151">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-allowed-authentication-servers"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3152">Configurar a lista de servidores de autenticação permitidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3152">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3153">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3153">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3154">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3154">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3155">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3155">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3156">Especifica quais servidores devem ser habilitados para autenticação integrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3156">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3157">A autenticação integrada só é habilitada quando o Microsoft Edge recebe um desafio de autenticação de um proxy ou de um servidor nesta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3157">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3158">Separe vários nomes de servidor com vírgulas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3158">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3159">Caracteres curinga (\*) são permitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3159">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3160">Se você não configurar essa política, o Microsoft Edge tentará detectar se um servidor está somente na intranet e responderá à solicitações IWA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3160">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3161">Se o servidor estiver na Internet, as solicitações IWA dele serão ignoradas pelo Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3161">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3162">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3162">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3163">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3163">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3164">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3164">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3165">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3165">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3166">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3166">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3167">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3167">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3168">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3168">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3169">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3169">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3170">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3170">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3171">Nome da Política de Grupo: Configurar lista de servidores de autenticação permitidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3171">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3172">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3172">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3173">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3173">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3174">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3174">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3175">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3175">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3176">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3176">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3177">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3177">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3178">Nome do valor: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3178">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3179">Tipo do valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3179">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3180">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3180">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3181">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3181">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3182">Nome da chave de preferência: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3182">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3183">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3183">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="basicauthoverhttpenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3185">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3185">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-basic-authentication-for-http"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3186">Permitir autenticação Básica para HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3186">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3187">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3187">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3188">No Windows e no macOS desde 88 ou posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3188">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3189">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3189">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3190">Se você habilitar esta política ou deixá-la sem definição, os desafios de autenticação Básica recebidos por HTTP não seguro serão permitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3190">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3191">Se você desabilitar essa política, as solicitações HTTP  não seguras do esquema de autenticação Básica serão bloqueadas e somente HTTPS seguro será permitido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3191">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3192">Essa configuração de política será ignorada (e a Básica sempre será proibida) se a política [AuthSchemes](#authschemes) estiver definida e não incluir a Básica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3192">This policy setting is ignored (and Basic is always forbidden) if the [AuthSchemes](#authschemes) policy is set and does not include Basic.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3193">Recursos com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3193">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3194">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3194">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3195">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3195">Can be recommended: No</span></span>

  ### <a name="disableauthnegotiatecnamelookup"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3216">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3216">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-cname-lookup-when-negotiating-kerberos-authentication"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3217">Desabilitar a pesquisa CNAME durante a negociação da autenticação Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3217">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3218">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3218">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3219">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3219">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3220">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3220">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3221">Determina se o SPN Kerberos gerado se baseia no nome DNS canônico (CNAME) ou no nome original inserido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3221">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3222">Se você habilitar essa política, a pesquisa CNAME será ignorada, e o nome do servidor (conforme inserido) será usado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3222">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3223">Se você desabilitar essa política ou não a configurar, será usado o nome canônico do servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3223">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3224">Isso é determinado através da pesquisa CNAME.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3224">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3225">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3225">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3226">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3226">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3227">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3227">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3228">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3228">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3229">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3229">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3230">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3230">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3231">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3231">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3232">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3232">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3233">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3233">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3234">Nome da Política de Grupo: Desabilitar a pesquisa CNAME durante a negociação da autenticação Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3234">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3235">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3235">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3236">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3236">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3237">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3237">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3238">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3238">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3239">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3239">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3240">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3240">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3241">Nome do Valor: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3241">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3242">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3242">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3243">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3243">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3244">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3244">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3245">Nome da chave de preferência: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3245">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3246">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3246">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="enableauthnegotiateport"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3248">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3248">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <a name="include-non-standard-port-in-kerberos-spn"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3249">Incluir porta não padrão no SPN Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3249">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3250">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3250">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3251">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3251">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3252">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3252">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3253">Especifica se o SPN Kerberos gerado deve incluir uma porta não padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3253">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3254">Se você habilitar essa política, e o usuário incluir uma porta não padrão (uma porta diferente de 80 ou 443) em uma URL, essa porta será incluída no SPN Kerberos gerado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3254">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3255">Se você não configurar ou desabilitar essa política, o SPN Kerberos gerado não incluirá uma porta em nenhum caso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3255">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3256">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3256">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3257">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3257">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3258">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3258">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3259">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3259">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3260">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3260">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3261">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3261">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3262">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3262">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3263">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3263">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3264">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3264">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3265">Nome da Política de Grupo: Incluir porta não padrão no SPN Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3265">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3266">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3266">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3267">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3267">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3268">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3268">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3269">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3269">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3270">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3270">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3271">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3271">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3272">Nome do valor: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3272">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3273">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3273">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3274">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3274">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  ### <a name="ntlmv2enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3279">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3279">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-whether-ntlmv2-authentication-is-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3280">Controlar se a autenticação NTLMv2 está habilitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3280">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3281">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3281">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3282">No macOS desde 77 ou posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3282">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3283">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3283">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3284">Controla se o NTLMv2 está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3284">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3285">Todas as versões recentes dos servidores do Samba e do Windows oferecem suporte a NTLMv2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3285">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3286">Você só deve desabilitar o NTLMv2 para resolver problemas de compatibilidade com versões anteriores, pois isso reduz a segurança de autenticação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3286">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3287">Se você não configurar essa política, o NTLMv2 estará habilitado por padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3287">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3288">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3288">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3289">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3289">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3290">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3290">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3291">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3291">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3292">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3292">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3293">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3293">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3294">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3294">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3295">Nome da chave de preferência: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3295">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3296">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3296">Example value:</span></span>

<true/>
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3301">No Windows desde 90 ou posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3301">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3303">Indica se a IU de Credencial do Windows deve ser usada para responder aos desafios de autenticação do NTLM e negociar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3303">Indicates if Windows Credential UI should be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate authentication challenges.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3308">Pode ser recomendável: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3308">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3309">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3309">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3314">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3314">GP unique name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3315">Nome da Política de Grupo: Windows Hello para autenticação HTTP habilitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3315">GP name: Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3316">Caminho da Política de Grupo (Obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3316">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3317">Caminho da Política de Grupo (Recomendado): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3317">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3318">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3318">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3320">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3320">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3321">Caminho (Recomendado): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3321">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3323">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3323">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ### <a name="kioskaddressbareditingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3328">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3328">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-bar-editing-for-kiosk-mode-public-browsing-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3329">Configure a edição da barra de endereços para a experiência de navegação pública do modo de quiosque.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3329">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3330">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3330">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3331">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3331">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3333">Esta política só se aplica ao modo de quiosque do Microsoft Edge, usando a experiência de navegação pública.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3333">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3334">Se você habilitar ou não configurar esta política, os usuários poderão alterar o URL na barra de endereço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3334">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3335">Se você desativar esta política, ela impedirá que os usuários alterem o URL na barra de endereço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3335">If you disable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3336">Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como configurar o modo de quiosque, consulte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3336">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3337">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3337">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3339">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3339">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3340">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3340">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3341">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3341">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3342">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3342">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3343">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3343">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3344">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3344">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3345">Nome exclusivo da GP: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3345">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3346">Nome da GP: Configure a edição da barra de endereços para a experiência de navegação pública do modo de quiosque.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3346">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3347">Caminho da GP (obrigatório): modelos administrativos/Microsoft Edge/configurações do modo de quiosque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3347">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3348">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3348">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3349">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3349">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3350">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3350">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3351">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3351">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3352">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3352">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3353">Nome do valor: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3353">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3357">Nome da Chave de Preferência: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3357">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="kioskdeletedownloadsonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3360">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3360">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-files-downloaded-as-part-of-kiosk-session-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3361">Excluir arquivos baixados como parte de uma sessão modo de quiosque quando o Microsoft Edge for fechado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3361">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3362">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3362">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3363">No Windows desde 87 ou posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3363">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3364">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3364">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3365">Esta política só se aplica ao modo de quiosque do Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3365">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3366">Se você habilitar essa política, os arquivos baixados como parte da sessão quiosque serão excluídos sempre que o Microsoft Edge for fechado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3366">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3367">Se você desabilitar essa política ou não a configurar, os arquivos baixados como parte da sessão quiosque não serão excluídos quando o Microsoft Edge for fechado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3367">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-3368">Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como configurar o modo de quiosque, confira [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3368">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3369">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3369">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3370">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3370">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3371">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3371">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3372">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3372">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3373">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3373">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3374">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3374">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3375">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3375">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3376">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3376">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3377">Nome exclusivo da GP: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3377">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3378">Nome da GP: Excluir arquivos baixados como parte de uma sessão quiosque quando o Microsoft Edge for fechado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3378">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3379">Caminho da GP (obrigatório): modelos administrativos/Microsoft Edge/configurações do modo de quiosque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3379">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3380">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3380">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3381">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3381">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-3382">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3382">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3383">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3383">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3384">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3384">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3385">Nome do valor: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3385">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-3386">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-3386">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
