  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpsmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7622">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7622">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-mode-of-dns-over-https"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7623">Controlar o modo de DNS em HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7623">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7624">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7624">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7625">No Windows e no macOS desde 83 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7625">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7626">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7626">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7627">Controlar o modo de resolução DNS sobre HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7627">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7628">Observe que essa política só definirá o modo padrão para cada consulta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7628">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7629">O modo pode ser substituído para tipos especiais de consultas, como solicitações para resolver um nome de host DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7629">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7630">O modo "desativado" desabilitará o DNS em HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7630">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7631">O modo "automático" enviará primeiro as consultas DNS sobre HTTPS se houver um servidor DNS sobre HTTPS disponível e poderá recorrer ao envio de consultas inseguras por erro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7631">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7632">O modo "seguro" só enviará consultas DNS ao HTTPS e falhará na resolução de erros.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7632">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7633">Se você não configurar esta política, o navegador poderá enviar solicitações de DNS sobre HTTPS para um resolvedor associado ao resolvedor de sistema configurado do usuário.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7633">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7634">Mapeamento das opções de política:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7634">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7635">desativado (desativado) = Desabilitar o DNS em HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7635">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7636">automático (automático) = Habilitar o DNS em HTTPS com o fallback não seguro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7636">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7637">automático (automático) = Habilitar o DNS em HTTPS sem o fallback não seguro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7637">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7638">Use as informações anteriores ao configurar essa política.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7638">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7639">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7639">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7640">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7640">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7641">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7641">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7642">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7642">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7643">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7643">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7644">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7644">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7645">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7645">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7646">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7646">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7647">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7647">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7648">Nome da Política de Grupo: Controlar o modo de DNS sobre HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7648">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7649">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7649">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7650">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7650">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7651">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7651">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7652">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7652">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7653">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7653">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7654">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7654">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7655">Nome do valor: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7655">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7656">Tipo do valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7656">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7657">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7657">Example value:</span></span>

```
"off"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7658">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7658">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7659">Nome da chave de preferência: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7659">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7660">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7660">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpstemplates"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7662">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7662">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-uri-template-of-desired-dns-over-https-resolver"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7663">Especificar o modelo de URI do resolvedor de DNS sobre HTTPS desejado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7663">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7664">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7664">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7665">No Windows e no macOS desde 83 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7665">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7666">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7666">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7667">O modelo de URI do resolvedor de DNS sobre HTTPS desejado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7667">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7668">Para especificar vários resolvedores DNS de HTTPS, separe os modelos de URI correspondentes por espaços.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7668">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7669">Se você definir [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) como "seguro", essa política deverá estar definida e não poderá estar vazia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7669">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7670">Se você definir [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) como "automático" e essa política for definida, os modelos de URI especificados serão usados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7670">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7671">Se você não definir essa política, os mapeamentos embutidos serão usados para tentar atualizar o resolvedor de DNS atual do usuário para um resolvedor de DoH operado pelo mesmo provedor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7671">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7672">Se o modelo URI contiver uma variável DNS, as solicitações ao resolvedor usarão GET; caso contrário, as solicitações usarão POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7672">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7673">Os modelos formatados incorretamente serão ignorados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7673">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7674">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7674">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7675">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7675">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7676">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7676">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7677">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7677">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7678">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7678">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7679">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7679">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7680">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7680">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7681">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7681">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7682">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7682">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7683">Nome da Política de Grupo: Especificar o modelo de URI do resolvedor de DNS sobre HTTPS desejado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7683">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7684">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7684">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7685">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7685">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7686">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7686">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7687">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7687">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7688">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7688">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7689">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7689">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7690">Nome do valor: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7690">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7691">Tipo do valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7691">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7692">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7692">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7693">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7693">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7694">Nome da chave de preferência: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7694">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7695">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7695">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7696">Voltar ao início</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7696">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloaddirectory"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7697">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7697">DownloadDirectory</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-download-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7698">Configurar o diretório de download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7698">Set download directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7699">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7699">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7700">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7700">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7701">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7701">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7702">Configura o diretório a ser usado para baixar arquivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7702">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7703">Se você habilitar essa política, o Microsoft Edge usará o diretório fornecido, independentemente de o usuário ter especificado um ou escolhido a solicitação do local de download todas as vezes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7703">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7704">Confira [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) para obter uma lista de variáveis que podem ser usadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7704">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7705">Se você desabilitar ou não configurar essa política, o diretório de download padrão será usado, e o usuário poderá alterá-lo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7705">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7706">Se você definir um caminho inválido, o Microsoft Edge usará o diretório de download padrão do usuário.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7706">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7707">Se a pasta especificada pelo caminho não existir, o download disparará um aviso que pergunta ao usuário onde eles querem salvar o download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7707">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7708">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7708">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7709">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7709">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7710">Pode ser recomendável: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7710">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7711">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7711">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7712">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7712">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7713">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7713">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7714">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7714">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7715">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7715">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7716">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7716">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7717">Nome da Política de Grupo: Configurar o diretório de download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7717">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7718">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7718">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7719">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (usuários podem substituir)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7719">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7720">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7720">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7721">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7721">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7722">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7722">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7723">Caminho (recomendado): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7723">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7724">Nome do valor: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7724">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7725">Tipo do valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7725">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7726">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7726">Example value:</span></span>

```
"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7727">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7727">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7728">Nome da chave de preferência: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7728">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7729">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7729">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```

  ### <a name="downloadrestrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7731">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7731">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-download-restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7732">Permitir restrições de download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7732">Allow download restrictions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7733">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7733">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7734">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7734">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7735">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7735">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7736">Configura o tipo de download que o Microsoft Edge bloqueia completamente, sem permitir que os usuários substituam a decisão de segurança.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7736">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7737">Configurar 'BlockDangerousDownloads' para permitir todos os downloads, exceto aqueles que contêm avisos do Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7737">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7738">Configurar 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' para permitir todos os downloads, exceto aqueles com os avisos do Microsoft Defender SmartScreen sobre downloads potencialmente perigosos ou indesejados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7738">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7739">Configurar 'BlockAllDownloads' para bloquear todos os downloads.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7739">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7740">Se você não configurar essa política ou definir a opção 'DefaultDownloadSecurity', os downloads passarão pelas restrições de segurança usuais com base nos resultados da análise do Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7740">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7741">Lembre-se de que essas restrições se aplicam aos downloads de conteúdo de página da Web, bem como nas opções do menu de contexto “baixar link”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7741">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7742">Essas restrições não se aplicam ao salvar ou baixar a página atualmente exibida, nem se aplicam à opção Salvar como PDF nas opções de impressão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7742">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7743">Confira [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) para saber mais sobre o Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7743">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7744">Mapeamento das opções de política:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7744">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7745">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = Nenhuma restrição especial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7745">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7746">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Bloquear downloads perigosos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7746">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7747">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Bloquear downloads potencialmente perigosos ou indesejados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7747">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7748">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Bloquear todos os downloads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7748">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7749">Use as informações anteriores ao configurar essa política.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7749">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7750">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7750">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7751">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7751">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7752">Pode ser recomendável: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7752">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7753">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7753">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7754">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7754">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7755">Inteiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7755">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7756">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7756">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7757">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7757">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7758">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7758">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7759">Nome da Política de Grupo: Permitir restrições de download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7759">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7760">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7760">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7761">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (usuários podem substituir)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7761">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7762">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7762">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7763">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7763">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7764">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7764">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7765">Caminho (recomendado): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7765">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7766">Nome do valor: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7766">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7767">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7767">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7768">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7768">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7769">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7769">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7770">Nome da chave de preferência: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7770">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7771">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7771">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="edgecollectionsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7773">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7773">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-collections-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7774">Habilitar o recurso Coleções</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7774">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7775">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7775">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7776">No Windows e no macOS desde 78 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7776">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7777">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7777">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7778">Permite que os usuários acessem o recurso Coleções, onde eles podem coletar, organizar, compartilhar e exportar conteúdo com mais eficiência e com a integração com o Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7778">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7779">Se você habilitar ou não configurar essa política, os usuários poderão acessar e usar o recurso coleções no Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7779">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7780">Se você desabilitar essa política, os usuários não poderão acessar e usar conjuntos no Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7780">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7781">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7781">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7782">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7782">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7783">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7783">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7784">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: não requer a reinicialização do navegador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7785">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7785">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7786">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7786">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7787">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7787">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7788">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7789">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7789">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7790">Nome da Política de Grupo: Habilitar o recurso Coleções</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7790">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7791">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7791">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7792">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7792">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7793">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7794">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7795">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7795">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7796">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7796">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7797">Nome do valor: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7797">Value Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7798">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7798">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7799">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7799">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7800">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7800">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7801">Nome da chave de preferência: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7801">Preference Key Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7802">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7802">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="edgeshoppingassistantenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7804">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7804">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="shopping-in-microsoft-edge-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7805">Comprar no Microsoft Edge habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7805">Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7806">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7806">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7807">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7807">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7808">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7808">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7809">Esta política permite aos usuários comparar os preços de um produto que estão procurando, obter cupons ou descontos do site em que estão, aplicar cupons automaticamente e ajudar a finalizar compra mais rápido usando dados de preenchimento automático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7809">This policy lets users compare the prices of a product they are looking at, get coupons or rebates from the website they're on, auto-apply coupons and help checkout faster using autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7810">Se você habilitar ou não configurar esta política, os recursos de compra como comparação de preços, cupons, reembolsos e finalização de compra expressa serão automaticamente aplicados aos domínios de varejo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7810">If you enable or don't configure this policy, shopping features such as price comparison, coupons, rebates and express checkout will be automatically applied for retail domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7811">Os cupons do revendedor atual e os preços de outros revendedores serão buscados em um servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7811">Coupons for the current retailer and prices from other retailers will be fetched from a server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7812">Se você desabilitar esse recurso de compras de política, como comparação de preço, cupons e reembolsos não serão encontrados automaticamente para domínios de varejo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7812">If you disable this policy shopping features such as price comparison, coupons, rebates and express checkout will not be automatically found for retail domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7813">A partir da versão 90.0.818.56, o comportamento das mensagens informando aos usuários que há um cupom, reembolso, comparação de preços ou histórico de preços disponíveis nos domínios de compras também é feito através de uma faixa horizontal abaixo da barra de endereços.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7813">Starting in version 90.0.818.56, the behavior of the messaging letting users know that there is a coupon, rebate, price comparison or price history available on shopping domains is also done through a horizontal banner below the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7814">Anteriormente, esse sistema de mensagens era feito na barra de endereços.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7814">Previously this messaging was done on the address bar.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7815">Recursos com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7815">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7816">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7816">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7817">Pode ser recomendável: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7817">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7818">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7818">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7819">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7819">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7820">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7820">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7821">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7821">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7822">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7822">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7823">Nome exclusivo da Política de Grupo: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7823">GP unique name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7824">Nome da Política de Grupo: Compras no Microsoft Edge habilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7824">GP name: Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7825">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7825">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7826">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (usuários podem substituir)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7826">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7827">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7827">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7828">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7828">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7829">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7829">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7830">Caminho (recomendado): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7830">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7831">Nome do Valor: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7831">Value Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7832">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7832">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7833">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7833">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7834">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7834">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7835">Nome da Chave de Preferência: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7835">Preference Key Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7836">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7836">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="editfavoritesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7838">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7838">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7841">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 ou mais recente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7841">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7843">Habilite essa política para permitir que os usuários adicionem, removam e modifiquem favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7843">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7844">Esse será o comportamento padrão se você não configurar a política.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7844">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7845">Desabilite essa política para impedir que os usuários adicionem, removam ou modifiquem os favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7845">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7846">Eles ainda podem usar favoritos existentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7846">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7849">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7849">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7850">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7850">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7852">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7852">Boolean</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7855">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7855">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7856">Nome da Política de Grupo: Permite que os usuários editem favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7856">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7858">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7858">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7859">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7859">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ### <a name="enabledeprecatedwebplatformfeatures"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7870">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7870">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-deprecated-web-platform-features-for-a-limited-time-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7871">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7871">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7872">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7872">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7873">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7873">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7874">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7874">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7875">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7875">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7876">This policy is obsolete because dedicated web platform policies are now used to manage individual web platform feature deprecations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7876">This policy is obsolete because dedicated web platform policies are now used to manage individual web platform feature deprecations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7877">Especifique uma lista de recursos de Web Platform substituídos para reabilitar temporariamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7877">Specify a list of deprecated web platform features to temporarily re-enable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7878">Essa política permite reabilitar os recursos de plataforma da Web reaprovados por um tempo limitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7878">This policy lets you re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7879">Os recursos são identificados por uma marca de cadeia de caracteres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7879">Features are identified by a string tag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7880">Se você não configurar essa política, se a lista estiver vazia ou se um recurso não corresponder a uma das marcas de cadeia de caracteres com suporte, todos os recursos de plataforma da web substituídos permanecerão desabilitados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7880">If you don't configure this policy, if the list is empty, or if a feature doesn't match one of the supported string tags, all deprecated web platform features remain disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7881">Enquanto a própria política tem suporte nas plataformas acima, o recurso habilitado pode não estar disponível em todas essas plataformas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7881">While the policy itself is supported on the above platforms, the feature it's enabling might not be available on all of those platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7882">Nem todos os recursos substituídos da plataforma da Web podem ser reativados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7882">Not all deprecated Web Platform features can be re-enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7883">Somente os usuários explicitamente listados abaixo podem ser habilitados novamente e apenas por um período de tempo limitado, que é diferente por recurso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7883">Only those explicitly listed below can be re-enabled, and only for a limited period of time, which differs per feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7884">Você pode revisar o intuito por trás do recurso de plataforma da Web em https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7884">You can review the intent behind the Web Platform feature changes at https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7885">O formato geral da marca de cadeia de caracteres é [DeprecatedFeatureName] _EffectiveUntil [AAAAMMDD].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7885">The general format of the string tag is [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7886">Mapeamento das opções de política:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7886">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7887">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Habilitar a API ExampleDeprecatedFeature durante 2008/09/02</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7887">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7888">Use as informações anteriores ao configurar essa política.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7888">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7889">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7889">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7890">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7890">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7891">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7891">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7892">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7892">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7893">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7893">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7894">Lista de cadeias de caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7894">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7895">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7895">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7896">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7896">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7897">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7897">GP unique name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7898">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7898">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7899">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7899">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7900">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7900">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7901">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7901">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7902">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7902">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7903">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7903">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7904">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7904">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7905">Nome do valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7905">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7906">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7906">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7907">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7907">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = "ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7908">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7908">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7909">Nome da chave de preferência: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7909">Preference Key Name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7910">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7910">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="enabledomainactionsdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7912">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7912">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-domain-actions-download-from-microsoft-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7913">Habilitar ações de domínio para download da Microsoft (obsoleta)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7913">Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7914">OBSOLETA: Esta política é obsoleta e não funciona após a versão 84 do Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7914">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7915">Versões com suporte:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7915">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7916">No Windows e no macOS desde 77 até 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7916">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7917">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7917">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7918">Essa política não funciona porque o estado conflitante deve ser evitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7918">This policy doesn't work because conflicting states should be avoided.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7919">Essa política era usada para ativar/desativar o download da lista ações de domínio, mas nem sempre ela atingia o estado desejado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7919">This policy was used to enable/disable download of the domain actions list, but it didn't always achieve the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7920">O serviço de experimentação e configuração, que manipula o download, tem sua própria política de grupo para configurar o que será baixado do serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7920">The Experimentation and Configuration Service, which handles the download, has its own policy to configure what is downloaded from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7921">Use a política [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol), em vez dela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7921">Use the [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7922">No Microsoft Edge, as ações de domínio representam uma série de recursos de compatibilidade que ajudam o navegador a funcionar corretamente na Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7922">In Microsoft Edge, Domain Actions represent a series of compatibility features that help the browser work correctly on the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7923">A Microsoft mantém uma lista de ações a serem executadas em determinados domínios por motivos de compatibilidade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7923">Microsoft keeps a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7924">Por exemplo, o navegador pode substituir a Sequência de agente do usuário em um site se ele estiver quebrado devido à nova Sequência de agente do usuário no Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7924">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7925">Cada uma dessas ações deve ser temporária enquanto a Microsoft tenta resolver o problema com o proprietário do site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7925">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7926">Quando o navegador começar e, em seguida, periodicamente, o navegador entrará em contato com o Serviço de Experimentação e Configuração que contém a lista de ações de compatibilidade mais atualizadas para realizá-las.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7926">When the browser starts up and then periodically afterwards, the browser will contact the Experimentation and Configuration Service that contains the most up to date list of compatibility actions to perform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7927">Essa lista é salva localmente após ser recuperada pela primeira vez, para que as solicitações subsequentes só atualizem a lista se a cópia do servidor for alterada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7927">This list is saved locally after it is first retrieved so that subsequent requests will only update the list if the server's copy has changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7928">Se você habilitar essa política, a lista de ações de domínio continuará a ser baixada do Serviço de Experimentação e Configuração.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7928">If you enable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7929">Se você desabilitar essa política, a lista de ações de domínio deixará de ser baixada do Serviço de Experimentação e Configuração.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7929">If you disable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will no longer be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df77b-7930">Se você não configurar essa política, a lista de ações de domínio continuará a ser baixada do Serviço de Experimentação e Configuração.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7930">If you don't configure this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7931">Recursos compatíveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7931">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7932">Pode ser obrigatório: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7932">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7933">Pode ser recomendável: não</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7933">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7934">Atualização dinâmica das políticas: Sim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7934">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7935">Tipo de dados:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7935">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7936">Booliano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7936">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7937">Informações e configurações do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7937">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7938">Informações da Política de Grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7938">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7939">Nome Exclusivo da Política de Grupo: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7939">GP unique name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7940">Nome da GP: Habilitar a Transferência de Ações de Domínio da Microsoft (obsoleta)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7940">GP name: Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7941">Caminho da Política de Grupo (obrigatório): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7941">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7942">Caminho da Política de Grupo (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7942">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7943">Nome do arquivo ADMX da Política de Grupo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7943">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7944">Configurações de registro do Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7944">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7945">Caminho (obrigatório): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7945">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7946">Caminho (recomendado): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7946">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7947">Nome do valor: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7947">Value Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7948">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7948">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7949">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7949">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="df77b-7950">Informações e configurações do Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7950">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7951">Nome da chave de preferência: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7951">Preference Key Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="df77b-7952">Valor de exemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df77b-7952">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
